Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Wedding at Cana of Galilee:

Text.Language: Vai pe pihouit m~m/ini e~ta pencwt/r n~a~gayoc: aif m~pem~yo n~nefmay/t/c aunah] e~rof je Pi,~rictoc
This is the first miracle, which our good Savior, performed before His disciples, they believed in Him, the Christ.
هذه هي الآية الأولي التي صنعها مخلصنا الصالح أمام تلاميذه وآمنوا به أنه المسيح.
